title: Satellite Image Classification and Segmentation with Keras and EuroSAT
summary:
An applied sequence that walks through Keras-based classification and segmentation workflows with the EuroSAT Sentinel-2 dataset.

  • Review core semantic-segmentation concepts and architectures.
  • Implement training-ready preprocessing and augmentation pipelines.
  • Build and evaluate U-Net style models with Keras.
  • Interpret land-cover predictions for real-world decision making.
